title: 1986 Bulls VS Celtics (Jordan Scores 63) DVDRIP
description:
Since ppl are actually downloading Jordan's Last Allstar game from me, I thought I would contribute something a little more memorable. 


If I'm not mistaken, his 63 points scored in this game is still the most in NBA Playoff history. 


This video is ripped from a 5 disk DVD collection title the NBA's great finals games. I ripped them all from a friends collection years ago, but don't believe the others are worth sharing. 


Disk1 "Top 10 Greatest" of all time hosted by Bill Walton
-shots
-teams
-players
-moves


Disk2 1970 Lakers vs Knicks


Disk3 1986 Bulls VS Celtics
-Jordan VS Bird: MJ Drops 63 pts on the celtics in 1986 leaving Kevin Mchale dumbfounded.

Disk4 1998 Bulls VS Jazz 
-Jordan's Game winning shot, and final shot as a member of the Chicago Bulls. Little known fact that I think I'm the only one who figured out during the game is that he scored 23pts in the first half, 45pts total, and had the game winning shot.  A pair of numbers and performance that accurately summed up his career. 

Disk5 2004 Lakers vs Spurs
